meanings.definition: To surpass in achievement or performance.
meanings.sent1: She is outachieving her classmates in math.
meanings.sent2: The athlete is outachieving his personal best in every race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel is outachieving the birds in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The sun outachieves the moon in brightness every day.
meanings.sent5: The student outachieves all expectations with her dedication to learning.

meanings.definition: To outdo in accomplishments or success.
meanings.sent1: He is outachieving his competitors in sales this month.
meanings.sent2: The team is outachieving their goals for the season.
meanings.sent3: The cat is outachieving the dog in catching mice around the house.
meanings.sent4: Her smile outachieves any makeup in brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The company outachieves its rivals with innovative products and services.
